outputs.output_descr:
UNDP will provide preparatory assistance to support the proposed High-Level Commission on the Legal Empowerment of the Poor (HLCLEP) initiative. The preparatory assistance provided by UNDP will be under the guidance of the Director of the Energy and Environment Group, serving as UNDP's focal point for this initiative.

It may be noted at the outset that the proposed initiative is built on the assumption and conviction that the fight against poverty can only be won and the Millennium Development Goal's only achieved if governments succeed in sustaining the rule of law, thus giving all citizens enhanced opportunities and a stronger stake in the economy and future of their nations. 

UNDP, in its capacity as chair of the UN Development Group, and as manager of the Resident Coordinator system has, and continues to play a critical role within the UN system in addressing poverty eradication. Recognizing the significant role played by UNDP in the global effort to eradicate poverty, UNDP will undertake preparatory activities to support the proposed initiative for the period 1 Aug, 2005- 31 December, 2005.

project_descr: Prep. Assist.for creation of Secretariat for HLCLE happens in 2005.
project_title: Commission on Legal Empowerment of the Poor
